name: Add splash animation
description: Adds old style splash animation.

name: Alternative thumbnails
description: Adds options to replace video thumbnails using the DeArrow API or image captures from the video.

name: Ambient mode switch
description: Adds an option to bypass the restrictions of ambient mode or disable it completely.

name: Amoled
description: Applies a pure black theme to some components.

name: Append time stamps information
description: Adds an option to add the current video quality or playback speed in brackets next to the current time.

name: Background play
description: Enables playing music in the background.

name: Bitrate default value
description: Sets the audio quality to "Always High" when you first install the app.

name: Certificate spoof
description: Enables YouTube Music to work with Android Auto by spoofing the YouTube Music certificate.

name: Change package name
description: Changes the package name for Reddit to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: Package name of Reddit
options.description: The name of the package to rename the app to.

name: Change player flyout panel toggles
description: Adds an option to use text toggles instead of switch toggles within the additional settings menu.

name: Change start page
description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

name: Change start page
description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

name: Custom branding heading
description: Applies a custom heading in the top left corner within the app.

options.title: Header
options.description:
The path to a folder must contain one or more of the following folders matching the DPI of your device:

- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-mdpi
- drawable-hdpi

Each of these folders has to have the following files:

- yt_wordmark_header_light.png
- yt_wordmark_header_dark.png

name: Custom branding icon YouTube
description: Change the YouTube launcher icon to the icon specified in options.json.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The path to a folder must contain one or more of the following folders matching the DPI of your device:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders has to have the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher.png
- ic_launcher_round.png

name: Custom branding icon YouTube Music
description: Changes the YouTube Music app icon to the icon specified in options.json.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The path to a folder containing the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders has to have the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_music_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_music_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher_release.png

name: Custom branding name Reddit
description: Renames the Reddit app to the name specified in options.json.

name: Custom branding name YouTube
description: Rename the YouTube app to the name specified in options.json.

name: Custom branding name YouTube Music
description: Renames the YouTube Music app to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: App name in notification panel
options.description: The name of the app as it appears in the notification panel.

options.title: App name in launcher
options.description: The name of the app as it appears in the launcher.

name: Custom double tap length
description: Add 'double-tap to seek' value.

options.title: Double-tap to seek Values
options.description: A list of custom double-tap to seek lengths. Be sure to separate them with commas (,).

name: Custom package name
description: Changes the package name for the non-root build of YouTube and YouTube Music to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: Package name of YouTube
options.description: The name of the package to use in MicroG support

options.title: Package name of YouTube Music
options.description: The name of the package to use in MicroG support

name: Custom playback speed
description: Adds an option to customize available playback speeds.

name: Custom playback speed
description: Adds options to customize available playback speeds.

name: Custom player overlay opacity
description: Adds an option to change the opacity of the video player background when player controls are visible.

name: Custom seekbar color
description: Adds an option to customize seekbar colors in video players and video thumbnails.

name: Default playback speed
description: Adds an option to set the default playback speed.

name: Default video quality
description: Adds an option to set the default video quality.

name: Disable HDR video
description: Adds options to disable HDR video.

name: Disable QUIC protocol
description: Adds an option to disable CronetEngine's QUIC protocol.

name: Disable auto captions
description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

name: Disable auto captions
description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

name: Disable haptic feedback
description: Adds an option to disable haptic feedback when swiping the video player.

name: Disable landscape mode
description: Adds an option to disable landscape mode when entering fullscreen.

name: Disable overlay filter
description: Removes the dark overlay when comment, share, save to playlist, and flyout panels are open.

name: Disable pip notification
description: Disable pip notification when you first launch pip mode.

name: Disable rolling number animations
description: Adds an option to disable rolling number animations of video view count, user likes, and upload time.

name: Disable screenshot popup
description: Adds an option to disable the popup that shows up when taking a screenshot.

name: Disable shorts on startup
description: Adds an option to disable the Shorts player from resuming on app startup when Shorts were last being watched.

name: Disable speed overlay
description: Adds an option to disable 'Play at 2x speed' when pressing and holding in the video player.

name: Disable update screen
description: Adds an option to disable the "Update your app" screen that appears when using an outdated client.

name: Enable black navigation bar
description: Adds an option to set the navigation bar color to black.

name: Enable bottom player gestures
description: Adds an option to enter fullscreen when swiping down below the video player.

name: Enable color match player
description: Adds an option to match the color of the miniplayer to the fullscreen player. Deprecated on YT Music 6.34.51+.

name: Enable compact controls overlay
description: Adds an option to make the fullscreen controls compact.

name: Enable compact dialog
description: Adds an option to enable the compact flyout menu on phones.

name: Enable custom filter
description: Adds a custom filter which can be used to hide layout components.

name: Enable debug logging
description: Adds an option to enable debug logging.

name: Enable debug logging
description: Adds an option to enable debug logging.

name: Enable external browser
description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of in the in-app-browser.

name: Enable force minimized player
description: Adds an option to keep the miniplayer minimized even when another track is played.

name: Enable gradient loading screen
description: Adds an option to enable gradient loading screen.

name: Enable landscape mode
description: Adds an option to enable landscape mode when rotating the screen on phones.

name: Enable language switch
description: Adds an option to enable or disable language switching toggle.

name: Enable minimized playback
description: Enables playback in miniplayer for Kids music.

name: Enable minimized playback
description: Enables minimized and background playback.

name: Enable new splash animation
description: Adds an option to enable a new type of splash animation.

name: Enable new thumbnail preview
description: Adds an option to enables the new seekbar thumbnails preview.

name: Enable old player background
description: Adds an option to return the player background to the old style. Deprecated on YT Music 6.34.51+.

name: Enable old player layout
description: Adds an option to return the player layout to the old style. Deprecated on YT Music 6.31.55+.

name: Enable old quality layout
description: Adds an option to restore the old video quality menu with specific video resolution options.

name: Enable old style library shelf
description: Adds an option to return the library tab to the old style.

name: Enable old style miniplayer
description: Adds an option to return the miniplayer to the old style.

name: Enable open links directly
description: Adds an option to skip over redirection URLs in external links.

name: Enable opus codec
description: Adds an option use the opus audio codec instead of the mp4a audio codec.

name: Enable playback speed
description: Adds an option to add a playback speed button to the flyout panel.

name: Enable seekbar tapping
description: Adds an option to enable tap-to-seek on the seekbar of the video player.

name: Enable song search
description: Adds an option to enable song search in the voice search screen.

name: Enable tablet mini player
description: Adds an option to enable the tablet mini player layout.

name: Enable tablet navigation bar
description: Adds an option to enable the tablet navigation bar.

name: Enable wide search bar
description: Adds an option to replace the search icon with a wide search bar. This will hide the YouTube logo when active.

name: Enable zen mode
description: Adds an option to change the player background to light grey to reduce eye strain. Deprecated on YT Music 6.34.51+.

name: Exclusive audio playback
description: Unlocks the option to play music without video.

name: Force fullscreen
description: Adds an option to forcefully open videos in fullscreen.

name: Force opus codec
description: Adds an option to force the opus audio codec instead of the mp4a audio codec.

name: Force video codec
description: Adds an option to force the video codec.

name: Hide For You shelf
description: Adds an option to hide the For You shelf from the homepage.

name: Hide account menu
description: Adds the ability to hide account menu elements using a custom filter.

name: Hide account menu
description: Adds the ability to hide account menu elements using a custom filter in the account menu and You tab.

name: Hide action bar component
description: Adds options to hide action bar components and replace the offline download button with an external download button.

name: Hide ads
description: Adds options to hide ads.

name: Hide animated button background
description: Hides the background of the pause and play animated buttons in the Shorts player.

name: Hide auto player popup panels
description: Adds an option to hide panels (such as live chat) from opening automatically.

name: Hide autoplay button
description: Adds an option to hide the autoplay button in the video player.

name: Hide autoplay preview
description: Adds an option to hide the autoplay preview container when in fullscreen.

name: Hide button container
description: Adds options to hide action buttons below the video player.

name: Hide button shelf
description: Adds an option to hide the button shelf from the homepage and explore tab.

name: Hide captions button
description: Adds an option to hide the captions button in the video player.

name: Hide carousel shelf
description: Adds an option to hide the carousel shelf from the homepage and explore tab.

name: Hide cast button
description: Adds an option to hide the cast button.

name: Hide cast button
description: Adds an option to hide the cast button.

name: Hide category bar
description: Adds an option to hide the category bar.

name: Hide category bar
description: Adds an option to hide the category bar in feeds.

name: Hide channel avatar section
description: Adds an option to hide the channel avatar section of the subscription feed.

name: Hide channel guidelines
description: Adds an option to hide the channel guidelines at the top of the comments section.

name: Hide channel profile components
description: Adds an option to hide channel profile components.

name: Hide channel watermark
description: Adds an option to hide creator's watermarks in the video player.

name: Hide collapse button
description: Adds an option to hide the collapse button in the video player.

name: Hide comment component
description: Adds options to hide components related to comments.

name: Hide crowdfunding box
description: Adds an option to hide the crowdfunding box between the player and video description.

name: Hide description components
description: Adds an option to hide description components.

name: Hide double tap overlay filter
description: Removes the dark overlay when double-tapping to seek.

name: Hide double tap overlay filter
description: Hides the double tap dark filter layer.

name: Hide double tap to like animations
description: Hides the like animations when double tap the screen in the Shorts player.

name: Hide emoji picker and time stamp
description: Adds an option to hide the emoji picker and time stamp when typing comments.

name: Hide end screen cards
description: Adds an option to hide suggested video cards at the end of the video in the video player.

name: Hide end screen overlay
description: Adds an option to hide the overlay in fullscreen when swiping up and at the end of videos.

name: Hide feed flyout panel
description: Adds the ability to hide feed flyout panel components using a custom filter.

name: Hide filmstrip overlay
description: Adds an option to hide filmstrip overlay in the video player.

name: Hide floating microphone
description: Adds an option to hide the floating microphone button when searching.

name: Hide flyout panel
description: Adds options to hide flyout panel components.

name: Hide fullscreen panels
description: Adds an option to hide panels such as live chat when in fullscreen.

name: Hide fullscreen share button
description: Adds an option to hide the share button in the fullscreen player.

name: Hide general ads
description: Adds options to hide general ads.

name: Hide general ads
description: Adds options to hide general ads.

name: Hide get premium
description: Hides the "Get Music Premium" label from the account menu and settings.

name: Hide handle
description: Adds an option to hide the handle in the account menu.

name: Hide handle
description: Adds options to hide the handle in the account switcher and You tab.

name: Hide history button
description: Adds an option to hide the history button in the toolbar.

name: Hide info cards
description: Adds an option to hide info-cards in the video player.

name: Hide latest videos button
description: Adds options to hide latest videos button in home feed.

name: Hide layout components
description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

name: Hide load more button
description: Adds an option to hide the button under videos that loads similar videos.

name: Hide mix playlists
description: Adds an option to hide mix playlists in feed.

name: Hide music button
description: Adds an option to hide the YouTube Music button in the video player.

name: Hide navigation bar component
description: Adds options to hide navigation bar components.

name: Hide navigation buttons
description: Adds options to hide buttons in the navigation bar.

name: Hide navigation buttons
description: Adds options to hide and change navigation buttons (such as the Shorts button).

name: Hide navigation label
description: Adds an option to hide navigation bar labels.

name: Hide new playlist button
description: Adds an option to hide the "New playlist" button in the library.

name: Hide player button background
description: Hides the dark background surrounding the video player controls.

name: Hide player flyout panel
description: Adds options to hide player flyout panel components.

name: Hide player overlay filter
description: Removes the dark overlay when single-tapping player.

name: Hide playlist card
description: Adds an option to hide the playlist card from the homepage.

name: Hide previous next button
description: Adds an option to hide the previous and next buttons in the video player.

name: Hide recently visited shelf
description: Adds an option to hide the recently visited shelf in the sidebar.

name: Hide search term thumbnail
description: Adds an option to hide thumbnails in the search term history.

name: Hide seek message
description: Adds an option to hide the 'Slide left or right to seek' or 'Release to cancel' message container in the video player.

name: Hide seekbar
description: Adds an option to hide the seekbar in video player and video thumbnails.

name: Hide shorts components
description: Adds options to hide components related to YouTube Shorts.

name: Hide snack bar
description: Adds an option to hide the snack bar action popup.

name: Hide suggested actions
description: Adds an option to hide the suggested actions bar inside the player.

name: Hide suggested video overlay
description: Adds an option to hide the suggested video overlay at the end of videos.

name: Hide suggestions shelf
description: Adds an option to hide the suggestions shelf in feed.

name: Hide tap to update button
description: Adds an option to hide the tap to update button.

name: Hide taste builder
description: Hides the "Tell us which artists you like" card from the homepage.

name: Hide terms container
description: Adds an option to hide the terms of service container in the account menu.

name: Hide time stamp
description: Adds an option to hide the timestamp in the bottom left of the video player.

name: Hide toolbar button
description: Adds an option to hide the r/place or Reddit recap button in the toolbar.

name: Hide toolbar button
description: Adds an option to hide the button in the toolbar.

name: Hide tooltip content
description: Hides the tooltip box that appears when opening the app for the first time.

name: Hide tooltip content
description: Hides the tooltip box that appears on first install.

name: Hide trending searches
description: Adds an option to hide trending searches in the search bar.

name: Hide video ads
description: Adds an option to hide ads in the video player.

name: Hide voice search button
description: Hides the voice search button in the search bar.

name: Hide voice search button
description: Hide voice search button in search bar.

name: Keep landscape mode
description: Adds an option to keep landscape mode when turning the screen off and on in fullscreen.

name: Layout switch
description: Adds an option to trick dpi to use tablet or phone layout.

name: MaterialYou
description: Enables MaterialYou theme for Android 12+

name: MicroG support
description: Allows YouTube Music to run without root and under a different package name with MicroG.

name: MicroG support
description: Allows ReVanced Extended to run without root and under a different package name with MicroG.

name: Open links directly
description: Adds an option to skip over redirection URLs in external links.

name: Open links externally
description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of in the in-app-browser.

name: Overlay buttons
description: Adds an option to display overlay buttons in the video player.

options.title: Wider bottom padding
options.description: Apply wider bottom padding. Click effect may not be shown in the correct position.

name: Premium icon
description: Unlocks premium app icons.

name: Quick actions components
description: Adds options to hide and customize components below the seekbar in fullscreen.

name: Remember playback speed
description: Adds an option to remember the last playback speed selected.

name: Remember repeat state
description: Adds an option to remember the state of the repeat toggle.

name: Remember shuffle state
description: Adds an option to remember the state of the shuffle toggle.

name: Remember video quality
description: Adds an option to remember the last video quality selected.

name: Remove subreddit dialog
description: Adds options to remove the NSFW community warning and notifications suggestion dialogs by dismissing them automatically.

name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

name: Replace cast button
description: Adds an option to replace the cast button in the player with the "Open music" button.

name: Replace dismiss queue
description: Adds an option to replace "Dismiss queue" with "Watch on YouTube" in the flyout menu.

name: Return YouTube Dislike
description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of songs using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

name: Return YouTube Dislike
description: Shows the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Adds an option to remove tracking query parameters from URLs when sharing links.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Adds an option to remove tracking query parameters from URLs when sharing links.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Adds an option to remove tracking query parameters from URLs when sharing links.

name: Settings
description: Adds ReVanced Extended settings to YouTube Music.

name: Settings
description: Adds ReVanced Extended settings to Reddit.

name: Settings
description: Applies mandatory patches to implement ReVanced Extended settings into the application.

name: Shorts outline button
description: Apply the outline icon to the action button of the Shorts player.

name: SponsorBlock
description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments such as non-music sections.

name: SponsorBlock
description: Integrates SponsorBlock which allows skipping video segments such as sponsored content.

name: Spoof app version
description: Adds options to spoof the YouTube Music client version. This can remove the radio mode restriction in Canadian regions or disable real-time lyrics.

name: Spoof app version
description: Adds options to spoof the YouTube client version. This can be used to restore old UI elements and features.

name: Spoof device dimensions
description: Adds an option to spoof the device dimensions which unlocks higher video qualities if they aren't available on the device.

name: Spoof player parameters
description: Adds options to spoof player parameters to prevent playback issues.

name: Swipe controls
description: Adds options to enable and configure volume and brightness swipe controls.

name: Theme
description: Change the app's theme to the values specified in options.json.

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

name: Translations
description: Adds Crowdin translations for YouTube Music.

name: Translations
description: Add Crowdin translations for YouTube.
